name: Last Second Escape
description:
Run, just RUN! Before you get locked inside, forever...

A 2D Platformer where you need to get to the door to get out from the room, before you get locked forever. Why? Because the room keep changing and shrinking! Get out as fast as possible.

Control:

Move: Arrow Key

Throw Key: C

Move to Key to grab it. Then bring it to the keyhole

Made for My First Game Jam Winter 2021
